title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.4 - Licensing new association
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.4 - Licensing new association

State Regulations

In granting a license to any new racing association
to conduct race meetings, the commission will consider especially the following
matters: (a) opportunity for the sport
to properly develop; (b) avoidance
of competition with established tracks; (c) extent of community support for the
promotion and continuance of the tracks; and
(d) the character and reputation of the
persons identified with the undertaking. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
